snippet: If the Giants lose against Dallas, the story will change very quickly: Many fans will want to show Tom Coughlin the door.
abstract: If the Giants lose against Dallas, the story will change very quickly: Many fans will want to show Tom Coughlin the door.
lead_paragraph: Giants Coach Tom Coughlin is poised for a triumphant night.

headline.main: Coughlin a Keeper, Win or Lose?
